description.raw:
Current gazebo8 ros packages for Kinetic are broken and the current scripts [were not able to detect it](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo8_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/75/). I've fixed the bug in this PR and now the [script is failing as I it should](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo8_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/77/).

I've also notice that we were not testing the official gazebo-ros-pkgs version and also added them in this PR to check that [they are working properly](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-install_pkg_kinetic-xenial-amd64/)
description.html:
Current gazebo8 ros packages for Kinetic are broken and the current scripts were not able to detect it. I've fixed the bug in this PR and now the script is failing as I it should.

I've also notice that we were not testing the official gazebo-ros-pkgs version and also added them in this PR to check that they are working properly

title.raw: Fix and improve gazebo_ros_pkgs testing scripts
